alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 5:54AM EDT until April 09 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Lumber City affecting Wheeler, Telfair and Montgomery Counties. Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Wilcox, Telfair and Dodge Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Abbeville, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Lumber City. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Flood Stage is reached and minor flooding begins. Water overflows into the broad swampy flood plain. Farm fields on the right bank flood. General agriculture and timber interests are affected by the flooding. In addition...water reaches the top of the boat ramp near the Highway 341 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.1 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
